name: As I Began to Dream
description:
As I Began to Dream  is a 2D Puzzle Platformer game where players will play as a little girl named Lily who is having problems in her family or a broken home.

This game tells about Lily who is trapped in her dream world. Players can help Lily by changing the point of view or platformer around Lily so that Lily can get out of her dream. In every dream, Lily will get memories from her family. Guide Lily, so she can get back to what it means to be a warm family
